SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Build Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Location to save" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive file name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!-----------------------------------------------------------Username Password check---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Either provide both username and password or both can be empty :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 :ENDIF
:IF &COUNT# = 1 SET ERRORS =1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Either provide both username and password or both can be empty!" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR :ELSE
!-------------------------------------Creating Artifact path------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : ENDIF ! Config Archive file : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# = "buildarchive-&$RUNID#.zip" : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#, ".zip") : ENDIF
: PSET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR#,&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#)
!-------------------------------------Create cURL command to call Teamcity REST api--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth"
:IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# EQ "" : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# EQ "" : SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "guestAuth" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl -v "
! Teamcity url :SET &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_URL#, "/&AUTH_TYPE#/app/rest/builds/id:&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#/artifacts/archived ") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# :SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "&UC4RB_TMC_OPTION_VALUE# ")
:SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "--request GET --header 'accept:application/octet-stream' --output &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH# -w %%{http_code} ")
:IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# NE "" ! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Execute curl cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#" SetLocal EnableDelayedExpansion :IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" FOR /F %%a IN ('&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"') DO ( :ELSE FOR /F %%a IN ('&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#') DO ( :ENDIF SET RESP_HTTP_CODE=%%a ) SetLocal DisableDelayedExpansion echo "INFO: HTTP RESPONSE CODE: %RESP_HTTP_CODE%" IF %RESP_HTTP_CODE% NEQ 200 ( SET ERRORS=1 IF %RESP_HTTP_CODE% EQU 000 ( ECHO "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." ) ) :CASE "UNIX" echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#" :IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" RESP_HTTP_CODE=`&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"` :ELSE RESP_HTTP_CODE=`&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#` :ENDIF echo "INFO: HTTP RESPONSE CODE: $RESP_HTTP_CODE" if [ "$RESP_HTTP_CODE" -ne "200" ] then errors=1 if [ "$RESP_HTTP_CODE" -eq "000" ] then echo "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." fi fi :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
:ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RETRIEVE ARTIFACT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RETRIEVED ARTIFACT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
!Publish the artifact location :PSET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
